name: Groca-Grocery
description: Developed a project where users can Sign up, Log in, order products, restock products, etc.
details1: Developed a project where users can Sign up, Log in, order products, restock products, etc.
details2: Integrated Admin role, An admin can manage products, delete products, add products.
details3: Used firebase and JWT for authentication and hosting, and deploy the server to Heroku.
technology: React, React-bootstrap, React-router, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku.

name: Motor-Parts
description: Developed a project where user can create their profile, and update their profile, make a review & order products.
details1: Developed a project where user can create their profile, and update their profile, make a review & order products.
details2: Integrated Admin role, admin can manage or remove a user, make the user an admin, add a product, or delete products.
technology: React, Tailwind, Daisy UI, JWT, React-router, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku.

name: Dentist-Rita
description: Developed a small independent service provider website using JavaScript, React and Bootstrap.
details1: Developed a small independent service provider website using JavaScript, React and Bootstrap.
details2: Users can see the provided services and Sign up or Log in to Check out the appointment.
details3: Used firebase for hosting. . Backend is not included now.
